notes: This manifest was generated by scanning .py files (including nested zips) and inferring domains/tags/deps from imports and filenames.
imports_unknown lists non-stdlib modules not mapped to PyPI packages; some may be local modules or require manual mapping.
Each tool is intended to be exposed via an MCP script-runner wrapper (stdio).

tools.description: airflow minimal DAG definition. Place this file in your Airflow dags folder. Running it directly will only construct the DAG if airflow is installed.
Google Calendar API minimal skeleton. Requires service account JSON path in: GOOGLE_CRED_JSON This demo only builds a client and lists next 1 event if credentials are provided.
imbox minimal login skeleton. Set IMAP_HOST, IMAP_USER, IMAP_PASS env vars to actually connect.
airflow minimal DAG definition. Place this file in your Airflow dags folder. Running it directly will only construct the DAG if airflow is installed.
imbox minimal login skeleton. Set IMAP_HOST, IMAP_USER, IMAP_PASS env vars to actually connect.
OpenAI minimal API demo (requires OPENAI_API_KEY). Uses the modern client interface if installed.
ruff CLI demo on a tiny temp file.
scdl safe demo: print CLI help. This does not download anything.
schedule minimal periodic task demo (runs ~3 ticks)
streamlit minimal app. Run: streamlit run streamlit_app_demo.py
telethon minimal client construction. Requires you to set TELETHON_API_ID and TELETHON_API_HASH env vars for real use. This demo won't connect.
typer minimal CLI demo. Run: python typer_demo.py hello --name wofl
watchdog file system event demo (temp dir)
airflow minimal DAG definition. Place this file in your Airflow dags folder. Running it directly will only construct the DAG if airflow is installed.
Google Calendar API minimal skeleton. Requires service account JSON path in: GOOGLE_CRED_JSON This demo only builds a client and lists next 1 event if credentials are provided.
gradio minimal app. Run: python gradio_demo.py
OpenAI minimal API demo (requires OPENAI_API_KEY). Optional: set OPENAI_DEMO_MODEL to override model
GitHub repo auto-pull demo (safe). Set: GITHUB_REPOS_DIR (folder containing git repos)
GitHub repo cloner skeleton (safe). Set: GITHUB_CLONE_LIST (comma-separated git URLs) GITHUB_CLONE_DIR (target folder) This demo will clone missing repos and skip existing ones.
Google Calendar weekly summarizer demo. Requires: GOOGLE_CRED_JSON (service account JSON) Prints a compact bullet summary of events in the next 7 days.
Slack thread summarizer skeleton. Requires: SLACK_BOT_TOKEN This demo does not call Slack. It prints the minimal request shape.
Auto-lock workstation on USB removal (platform-aware skeleton). This demo only shows lock logic. Wire it to your preferred device watcher. Windows lock: rundll32.exe user32.dll,LockWorkStation
Wi-Fi password recovery demo (Windows-only). Uses `netsh` to list profiles and show keys.
typer minimal CLI demo. Run: python typer_demo.py hello --name wofl
ruff CLI demo on a tiny temp file.
scdl safe demo: print CLI help. This does not download anything.
GitHub repo auto-pull demo (safe). Set: GITHUB_REPOS_DIR (folder containing git repos)
GitHub repo cloner skeleton (safe). Set: GITHUB_CLONE_LIST (comma-separated git URLs) GITHUB_CLONE_DIR (target folder) This demo will clone missing repos and skip existing ones.
Google Calendar weekly summarizer demo. Requires: GOOGLE_CRED_JSON (service account JSON) Prints a compact bullet summary of events in the next 7 days.
Slack thread summarizer skeleton. Requires: SLACK_BOT_TOKEN This demo does not call Slack. It prints the minimal request shape.
Auto-lock workstation on USB removal (platform-aware skeleton). This demo only shows lock logic. Wire it to your preferred device watcher. Windows lock: rundll32.exe user32.dll,LockWorkStation
Wi-Fi password recovery demo (Windows-only). Uses `netsh` to list profiles and show keys.
streamlit minimal app. Run: streamlit run streamlit_app_demo.py
telethon minimal client construction. Requires you to set TELETHON_API_ID and TELETHON_API_HASH env vars for real use. This demo won't connect.
